solution_line_template: Harry's father is {harry_age} years + {father_age_difference} years = <<{harry_age}+{father_age_difference}={father_current_age}>>{father_current_age} years old.

Harry's mother is {mother_age_fraction} * {harry_age} years = <<{mother_age_fraction}*{harry_age}={mother_age_difference_from_father}>>{mother_age_difference_from_father} years younger than his father.

So she is currently {father_current_age} years - {mother_age_difference_from_father} years = <<{father_current_age}-{mother_age_difference_from_father}={mother_current_age}>>{mother_current_age} years old.
So when Harry was born, she was {mother_current_age} years - {harry_age} years = <<{mother_current_age}-{harry_age}={mother_age_at_birth}>>{mother_age_at_birth} years old.
